Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/Chicago Ave
ShortDescription: SB 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Chicago, Kingsberry, Grand, and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Chicago Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Chicago, Kingsberry, Grand, and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Chicago Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Division

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
